summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingOak Essential's clarifying, Pure Gel Cleanser is a clarifying gel cleanser that helps balance oil and reveals a nourished, brighter-looking complexion. Aloe Leaf Juice and Carrot Root Extract help hydrate and calm, leaving the skin feeling thoroughly refreshed.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor normal, oily or blemish-prone skin, or anyone needing a refreshing cleanseCleanse, clarify and refreshInstantly dissolves makeupSkin looks and feels refreshed and glowing2024 Bustle Beauty Awards Winner - Best Gel CleanserFeaturesNiacinamide, helps balance oil and clean pores while lifting away makeup and impurities.Aloe Leaf Juice helps soothe and moisturize for a clean, refreshing finish.Bottle is glass. Cap is PP 5. Carton is tree-free board.How to recycle: Remove pump from bottle. Rinse to remove any product. Dispose of bottle and cap in recycling bin. Dispose of pump in trash.Item 2645441How To UseUse AM and PM daily. Apply 2-3 pumps to damp skin and massage using circularmotions. Rinse off with water and pat skin dry.TIP: For a double cleanse, use after Cleansing BalmWarning: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. Do not ingest. Do not store at elevated temperatures.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Lauryl Glucoside, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Fragrance (Parfum), Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Lavandula Oil/Extract, Juniperus Virginiana Oil, Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Coumarin, Citronellol, Glyceryl Laurate, Limonene, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Linalool, Terpineol, Eugenol, Citral, Carvone, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Sorbic Acid, Pinene, Terpinolene, Geranyl Acetate, Camphor, BETA-Caryophyllene, Geraniol, Alpha-Terpinene, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, Linalyl Acetate, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, BETA-Carotene, Disteareth-75 IPDI.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use AM and PM daily. Apply 2-3 pumps to damp skin and massage using circularmotions. Rinse off with water and pat skin dry.TIP: For a double cleanse, use after Cleansing BalmWarning: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water immediately. Do not ingest. Do not store at elevated temperatures.
